constantValues: A sample to be used for analysis.

members.name: accessionNumber

constantValues: The identifier assigned by the lab when accessioning specimen(s). This is not necessarily the same as the specimen identifier, depending on local lab procedures.

members.description: The identifier assigned by the lab when accessioning specimen(s). This is not necessarily the same as the specimen identifier, depending on local lab procedures.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: bodySiteId

constantValues: Anatomical location from which the specimen was collected (if subject is a patient). This is the target site. This element is not used for environmental specimens.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Anatomical location from which the specimen was collected (if subject is a patient). This is the target site. This element is not used for environmental specimens.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: collectedMethodId

constantValues: A coded value specifying the technique that is used to perform the procedure.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A coded value specifying the technique that is used to perform the procedure.

members.name: collectedQuantity

constantValues: The quantity of specimen collected; for instance the volume of a blood sample, or the physical measurement of an anatomic pathology sample.

members.description: The quantity of specimen collected; for instance the volume of a blood sample, or the physical measurement of an anatomic pathology sample.

members.name: collectionCollectedDateTime

constantValues: The date Time when the specimen was collected from the subject - the physiologically relevant time.

members.description: The date Time when the specimen was collected from the subject - the physiologically relevant time.

members.name: collectionCollectedPeriodEnd

constantValues: The End period when a specimen was collected from a subject - the physiologically relevant time.

members.description: The End period when a specimen was collected from a subject - the physiologically relevant time.

members.name: collectionCollectedPeriodStart

constantValues: The start period when a specimen was collected from a subject - the physiologically relevant time.

members.description: The start period when a specimen was collected from a subject - the physiologically relevant time.

members.name: collectionCollectedType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Time when specimen was collected from subject - the physiologically relevant time.

members.description: Time when specimen was collected from subject - the physiologically relevant time.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: receivedTime

constantValues: Time when specimen was received for processing or testing.

constantValues: Where the specimen came from. This may be from the patient(s) or from the environment or a device.
